Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Christopher P. Mayr to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
Summary: Authorizes Christopher P. Mayr to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law for service as a fire fighter employed by the city of Rensselaer.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Christopher P. Mayr to receive certain credit under section 384-d of the retirement and social security law
